name: COVID19PotentialExposureICD10
title: COVID19 Potential Exposure (ICD10)
description:
Source https://www.cdc.gov/nchs/data/icd/ICD-10-CM-Official-Coding-Gudance-Interim-Advice-coronavirus-feb-20-2020.pdf
Given the variability in coding of diagnoses, this value set will be most useful with robust mapping of source data to the reference terms.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Intended to support surveillance and monitoring of COVID19 infection),(Data Element Scope: Compilation of ICD10 codes for potential COVID19 exposure; Includes nonspecific codes which have been commonly used in practice during the pandemic to indicate suspected COVID19 infection (eg coronavirus infection)),(Inclusion Criteria: Potential exposure to COVID19 virus, including known exposure with consistent signs and symptoms and asymptomatic individuals with potential exposure.),(Exclusion Criteria: Confirmed infection, Suspected infection)

concept.display: Contact with and (suspected) exposure to other viral communicable diseases
